data.title: Eye Doctors Near Me Open on Saturdays
data.meta_description: Get directions to our vision center, check opening hours and see contact info. Visit an eye doctor near you, today!
data.text:
HOURS & LOCATIONS

With offices in Tri-Cities and Yakima, Precision Eye Doctors proudly serves South Central Washington and

Eastern Oregon.

Call us to make an appointment with our eye doctors to talk about your eye health, contact lenses or specialty lens needs. Scroll down for more details about our practice locations, contact details and hours.

Home » Hours & Locations

Our Eye Care Practice in Kennewick and Yakima

Dr. Thomas Beck and Dr. Janis Beck at Precision Eye Doctors have been providing Kennewick and Yakima with quality eye care for many years.

The optometrists in our Practice provide comprehensive eye care to patients of all ages including treatment for a range of conditions including glaucoma, diabetic retinopathy, dry eye, cataracts and macular degeneration.

We are located across from Columbia Center Mall next to Bed, Bath & Beyond and inside Eyemart Express.

1220 N Columbia Center Blvd, Ste H

Kennewick, WA 99336

Tuesday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

2402 S 1st Street, Suite 114

Yakima, WA 98903

Monday: Closed

Tuesday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Wednesday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Thursday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM

Friday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

We are located across from Miner's Restaurant and inside Eyemart Express.

Have An Eye Care Emergency?

Please call our Kennewick office at: 509-591-9277 or our Yakima office at: 509-972-5379. If you experience loss of vision, double vision, swelling, infection or any eye emergency, contact us immediately for guidance. We’ll help you with the best treatment to prevent complications and promote long-lasting clear eyesight.

Use your best judgment on urgency – find the nearest emergency room or review our emergency page for tips.
